title: Can the new Warwick Q over Azir`s ult?
body: I know his ult can, but what about his Q?

replies.body: Warwick Q can, as i did it earlier on another acc, it just has to be timed is all

Warwicks Q Follows someone, it doesn't leap by itself. He theoretically could, IF azir first stood infront of the wall then dashed away while WW jaws himself on the birdboiii.

again, theoretically, i have no idea if it actually works, but considering he blink-chases flashes and TP's id say he could, should.

WW Q has a nice little effect of being immune to displacements. So if I am not mistaken, it should allow WW to go through it. But azir's ult also states no enemy champion can go through it so I don't really know. His wall has terrible interactions with stuff anyways.
WW needed to remain skilless trash so they made him immune to displacements (like Azir R) during his Q and R.
